title: TFR Ep. 572: Cry Macho, Karen, Who Dat?!?
description:
This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss ‘Cry Macho’, as a now 91 year old Clint Eastwood directs and stars in this neo-Western, but has he aged out of the role?  Then BET presents ‘Karen’.  A horror film for our times?  A misguided cry for action?  Or a camp classic?  There’s the thrilling review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show with another round of everyone’s favorite role-playing segment, ‘Who Dat?!?’!  This time featuring Christopher Nolan, Daniel Craig, Kevin Feige, and more!

00:00-10:57: Intro/Cry Macho

10:58-24:50: Physical Media Picks

24:51-38:56: Karen

38:57-1:09:06: Who Dat?!?

1:09:07-1:10:59: Wrap Up

 Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

This week on The First Run, Chris and Matt discuss ‘Cry Macho’, as a now 91 year old Clint Eastwood directs and stars in this neo-Western, but has he aged out of the role?  Then BET presents ‘Karen’.  A horror film for our times?  A misguided cry for action?  Or a camp classic?  There’s the thrilling review of the big releases on Physical Media, featuring the Streaming and Straight to DVD Picks of the Week.  Matt and Chris then close out the show with another round of everyone’s favorite role-playing segment, ‘Who Dat?!?’!  This time featuring Christopher Nolan, Daniel Craig, Kevin Feige, and more!
